backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing Valentine flow enhancements and related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and Valentine flow components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH theme variables and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing 3-step Valentine flow and rendering steps with footer and toaster.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeartB: Generates floating heart animations that auto-clear after completion.
frontend/src/components/valentine/steps/: Intro screen showing greeting, decoration images, and a button to advance.
Displays love letter text with a bottom Continue button.
Gallery of four love-themed images with captions and a Back to Start button.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Provides themed layout with background image and floating hearts wrapping all steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for managing Internet Identity login state, including loading, login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a Valentine-themed color palette with custom animations for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and Valentine palette mappings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata and requirements for a 3-step Valentine-themed website, including features, images, and navigation flow.
